lead.p: substring â€” Extracts the chars in a string between two specified indexes.

example.heading: substring example
example.code: console.log('Hello World'.substring(1)); // ello World console.log('Hello World'.substring(10)); // d console.log('Hello World'.substring(1, 10)); // ello Worl console.log('Hello World'.substring(7, 10)); // orl console.log('Hello World'.substring(0, 1)); // H

p.xref: Article on substr vs substring vs slice
